properties.name: shiny.proxy.ldap.url
properties.description: Specifies the LDAP server URL when not using the embedded LDAP server. For example, 'ldaps://ldap.example.com:33389/dc=myco,dc=org'.

properties.name: shiny.proxy.ldap.manager-dn
properties.description: User name (DN) of the 'manager' user identity (i.e. 'uid=admin,ou=system') which will be used to authenticate to a (non-embedded) LDAP server. If omitted, anonymous access will be used.

properties.name: shiny.proxy.ldap.manager-password
properties.description: The password for the manager DN. This is required if the manager-dn is specified.

properties.name: shiny.proxy.docker.port-range-start
properties.description: The port number to start on when assigning containers.

properties.name: shiny.proxy.docker.number-of-containers
properties.description: The number of containers to create and start.

properties.name: shiny.proxy.docker.image-name
properties.description: The name of the Docker image to use for containers.'

properties.name: shiny.proxy.title
properties.description: Title to use in the toolbar

properties.name: shiny.proxy.landing-page
properties.description: The Shiny page to open when logged in, i.e. '/sample-apps/'

properties.name: shiny.proxy.logo-url
properties.description: URL for the logo to use in the toolbar
